title: Verstappen cruises to win as Piastri crashes out - 2025 Azerbaijan GP results
summary: World champion Verstappen dominated the Baku race to take his second consecutive victory as Piastri retired

qa_pairs.question: Which driver won the 2025 Azerbaijan Grand Prix?
What significant event happened to Oscar Piastri during the 2025 Azerbaijan GP?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: He crashed out of the race.
wrong_options: He retired due to engine failure.

qa_pairs.question: How many consecutive victories did Verstappen achieve with his win in Azerbaijan?
